Text: RE ANR Janesville Cc Gary I have scheduled a mmbtu makeup at ANR Janesville POI effective Nov thru Nov James Original Message From Spraggins Gary Sent Tuesday November PM To Carr James Cc Buchanan John Subject ANR Janesville James current month imbalance shows we owe them mmbtu can you see if we can get some make up scheduled to them Gary

STORAGE ALLOCATION Cc Lynn I have resolved Tony Gee and Matt Martindale questions concerning this weekend storage allocation for the gas day June Matt was concern that Tenaskas Mid contract was cut by our storage allocation the first time on Intraday In fact this contract received a small cut on the NonGrid AM cycle Matt changed his nomination in the evening cycle to change some of his supply from Northern Borders Ventura to Mid storage This nomination change will now be code as incremental on his storage contract for the remaining cycles Tenaska was able to avoid storage allocation cut on their IDD contract until Intraday due to a PRR code for supply cut by Northern Border at Ventura Our storage allocation only cut Tenaska Mid path for gas delivered to their contract due to storage cuts downstream I have advised Matt to be aware of these problems when changes nomination Tony Gee thought he was being bump or cut in the Intraday cycle on his IT contract and FDD contract on his supply from Northern Borders Ventura Prior to Intraday we donot trueup storage allocation cuts until Intraday with Northern Border Tony was only checking his nomination with Northern Border on his contract and seeing all his volume schedule to flow Tony failed to check his schedule volumes in HotTap after the evening cycle to see his actual schedule volume was cut due to storage allocation Advised Tony to check his schedule volume in HotTap after each cycle James
